QuestData.Title: Risking It All
QuestData.Description: Wait, what?! How could he be so reckless? Blowing the ship free is insane! They could kill Shen-zin Su, and all of us with it. $B$BI know we don't have much time, but we need to think of another way...
QuestData.LogDescription: Remove the thorn from Shen-zin Su.
QuestData.RewardText: The first step is done, but now we must save Shen-zin Su!
